node.title: Supercharge your Static Site or Blog with Gridsome
node.description: Make your static site or blog work for you with the Gridsome static site generator.

node.title: NixOS Configuration Notes
node.description: Tips and tricks for configuring NixOS, a declarative, immutable Linux distribution.
